name: The Punch Drunk Monk
description:
Your temple has been raided by a bloodthirsty gang and one monk has had enough!  Play as Punch Drunk Monk and make your way back to your desecrated temple for a showdown with the leader!  There are many different hazards throughout your quest for vengeance, as well as dangerous foes such as deadly warriors, evil sorcerers, and enraged spirits!

Run, jump, and  fight your way through 4 levels to get to the final boss and teach him not to mess with a Punch Drunk Monk!

Punch Drunk Monk is a short, colorful 8bit platformer and the fourth game in my Grindhouse Games series.   Check out my profile for previous releases!

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys = Move
Z = Jump
X = Shoot
